title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 700.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 700.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all adjudicatory proceedings
conducted pursuant to Social Services Law section 494 to determine whether a
preponderance of the evidence shows that the subject of a substantiated report
of abuse or neglect has committed the act or acts of abuse or neglect giving
rise to the substantiated report. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
700.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
